thread.title: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Threw the Most Fire Child's Birthday Party | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Threw the Most Fire Child's Birthday Party | The Daily Dot

author: Kahron Spearman
title: Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Threw the Most Fire Child's Birthday Party | The Daily Dot
text:
Screengrab via Wiz Khalifa/Instagram BTW 
Amber Rose and rapper/former husband Wiz Khalifa know how to throw a party. For their son, Sebastian, they will go all out. 
The newly minted 4-year-old was treated to a star-studded event this weekend, packed with face painting, super hero costumes, bounce houses, and lots of mommy and daddy’s celebrity neighbors and friends. That included former basketball star Lamar Odom, Blac Chyna , and comedian Tom Arnold. [Placeholder for https://www.facebook.com/wizkhalifa/posts/10154884564361142 embed.] 
"We love Sebastian. He's our beautiful child,” said a Batwoman-costumed Rose, according to E! News . “He's super awesome. Happy birthday pumpkin." A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:20pm PST A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:08pm PST A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 12:22pm PST A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:44am PST A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:40am PST A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:37am PST A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:35am PST Despite rampant rumors, Rose recently confirmed that she and Wiz are not back together.
